did.unittitle: Petition to the Postmaster General of Northport
did.abstract: An 1873 two-page petition to the Postmaster General of Northport, Long Island that requests that the town post office be moved to a more convenient location. The petition also calls for the removal of the postmaster of Northport for incompetence.
